data: Sympathise with me, indeed! Ah, no! Cast your sympathy on the chill waves of troubled waters; fling it on the oases of futurity; dash it against the rock of gossip; or, better still, allow it to remain within the false and faithless bosom of buried scorn.
browsing: language & communication|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: romance|category: novels|category: british literature
